scenario_text.value:
Hmph! So, this is all those fools were
capable of. Seems you’ve acquired some skill.
Even so, it won’t save you from my wrath.
Now, who wants to die? Bring it on!

Augh! Don’t tell me this guy’s still ready to
fight!

That’s what it looks like. Not that I’d have
it any other way!
(Wait, now that I think about it...)

(I don’t see the Professor. Where’d he run
off to?)

Hey, Takuma! Don’t go spacing out in the
middle of a fight!

What? Don’t tell me you’re all talk? I
suppose that’s all humans ever are, isn’t it?

Now, enough stalling. If you’re not going to
come at me, I’ll strike at you!

No, there’s no time to think. Everyone, get
ready to hold off Garurumon!
